name: Coconut Milk Pancake
author: ohtammmy
summary: This recipe creates a thick fluffy pancake. Top them off with your favorite syrup, toasted coconut, whipped cream, or berries for a delectable start to the day.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can coconut milk, well shaken
directions: Combine flour, sugar, baking powder, baking soda, and salt together in a bowl
Whisk coconut milk, egg, butter, and vanilla extract together in a separate bowl; stir into the flour mixture just until batter is combined
Heat a lightly oiled griddle over medium-high heat
Drop batter by large spoonfuls onto the griddle and cook until bubbles form and the edges are dry, 3 to 4 minutes
Flip and cook until browned on the other side, 1 to 2 minutes
